mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_commodity (commodity_id, commodity_name, commodity_brand, commodity_variety, commodity_depict, commodity_price, commodity_amount, commodity_leavenum, commodity_standard, operator, create_time, update_time, commodity_picture) VALUES (#{commodityId}, #{commodityName}, #{commodityBrand}, #{commodityVariety}, #{commodityDepict}, #{commodityPrice}, #{commodityAmount}, #{commodityLeavenum}, #{commodityStandard}, #{operator}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp, #{commodityPicture});
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_commodity SET commodity_name = #{commodityName}, commodity_brand = #{commodityBrand}, commodity_variety = #{commodityVariety}, commodity_depict = #{commodityDepict}, commodity_price = #{commodityPrice}, commodity_amount = #{commodityAmount}, commodity_leavenum = #{commodityLeavenum}, commodity_standard = #{commodityStandard}, operator = #{operator}, commodity_picture = #{commodityPicture}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE commodity_id = #{commodityId}
